Highly survivor sided. In order to get kills you either have to play a instadowning character or do toxic things. Devs do not care about the game enough to balance the perks around the game. Instead they balance the game around the perks. Playing survivor is fun to bully the killer but if your the killer... welp good luck and dnc if you have fun or not.

玩了也1000+小时了，来简单说一说，
1爽感：需要简单的学习（大概100小时左右），学习一下绕板和地图，然后就可以欺负弱局了（不会玩的人类或者走地普通屠夫）
2对局：平衡性很差，所以放松心态，遇到屠皇或人皇该博弈就玩一玩，没得玩了挂机就好，一局游戏很快就结束了
3氪金：个人认为不怎么需要氪金，虽然已经脱离萌新很久了，但是有用的技能/人物就那么几个，人类自摸老人头打击钢筋，屠夫巴布护士，任何对局都可以打
4恐怖性：了解屠夫的机制之后其实一点都不恐怖，首先知道什么屠夫，然后听到心跳去板区开溜即可
5段位：这个游戏段位没有任何意义，所以不需要苟分什么的，找到自己玩的爽的方式就好

After putting in 1000 hours on the PS4 and almost 200 on PC, I still can't recommend this game to anyone in the current state that its in. It feels like nothing is fun anymore on both sides and constantly playing this game increases MMR to the point where every game is just a total sweatfest where everyone just focuses on themselves on survivor or seeing everyone run the same loadout every game on killer. I'm sad how BHVR keeps butchering this game with no great overhauls or updates anymore that improve the overall game.

731 hours play this game and this sucks developer, can't fix bugs. the solution is to present a story about lgbt, no wonder the number of players continues to decrease. please consider if u want to buy this.

Hey so ive played this fucking game for 400 fucking godamn forsaken hours and if god fucking forbid ONE OF MY FRIENDS ISNT ON for a full queue which btw ive seen the steam charts, there is a 0 ACCOUNTING FOR THE 1234560345 HOUR LONG QUEUE IT TAKES TO PAIR ME WITH A GODAMN CLOWN WHO FUCKS ME ON SIGHT EVERY TIME WITHOUT FAIL IF I HAVE 1 FUCKING RANDOM IT FUCKS MY ENTIRE NIGHT AND THE GAME IS SHIT. however it is fun to play with friends but then again even jail can be fun with the right people so this game is fucking absolute garbage please fix the fucking queue system because i would reallly like to play more than 1 game a fucking night when i have literally everyone ready already. U NERFED BOON BUT BUFFFED GHOST FACE. do you enjoy hurting us are you rping as killer irl or are you fucking dumb because it makes no sense you have entire communities on twitch and youtube who fucking do the work for you on balancing yet you continue to fuck us up the ass and give us shit outfits we didnt ask for and ignore literally everything else. remove clown from the fucking game he should not be able to reload infinitely spamming bullshit ass grenades. why the fuck can he spamm bullshit ass grenades. trickster is fucking garbage i dont care if hes hot. fucking delete him and clown or else.i just found out the name of your shit fucking ass company, behavoir. your days are fucking numbered you hear meee. delete clownnn fixx youre godamn queues im looking at the charts they say 40 thousand players , guess what behavoir i see 4 and theyre all my friends and then theres 1 clown and its me for still playing this shit ass fucking game 400 hours later. thank you for the holiday skin on the character dont play that cost 15 fucking dollars that looks like literal walking human fecal matter. that changed everything for me i dont know what else to say i love you fix your fucking game  .

Amazing game to play wid frnds, However isn't very without due to the incapability to Communicate with the Randoms you join. The arrival of new content and characters, numerous possibilities of game play actions keep me interested. Initially one may not get the game mechanics or may get bored of the monotonous mission type. Personally the numerous number of maps compensate the mission type. One Should give the game a proper try before deciding to refund or stop.

With each update comes a nice bundle of [strike] bugs [/strike] Ahem.. Features.
Instead of fixing their game they opted to bombard us with skins. 


The matchmaking is just all over the place, you basically flip a coin each lobby.
It's slowly killing the game and BHVR doesn't seem to notice or listen.

It's a pity because it really is a fun game (if the matchmaking gods decide so).

[spoiler] I guess they didn't do a pretty good job so far afterall... [/spoiler]
